mapper.select: select distinct l.*,cs2.name endSiteName,cs3.name startSiteName from tb_line l left join tb_line_site ls on l.id = ls.line_id left join tb_city_site cs on ls.site_id = cs.id ,tb_line_site ls2 ,tb_line_site ls3 ,tb_city_site cs2 ,tb_city_site cs3 where cs.id = #{siteId} and ls2.line_id = l.id and ls2.property_id = 2 and ls2.back_index = 1 and ls2.site_id = cs2.id and ls3.line_id = l.id and ls3.property_id = 1 and ls3.start_index = 1 and ls3.site_id = cs3.id

select distinct l.name lineName,ls.line_id lineId,cs.name startSiteName,cs2.name endSiteName ,cs.x_position startSiteLongitude,cs.y_position startSiteLatitude,ls.start_index startIndex ,cs2.x_position endSiteLongitude,cs2.y_position endSiteLatitude,ls2.start_index endIndex ,p.name propertyName,p.value propertyId from tb_line_site ls left join tb_city_site cs on cs.id = #{startSiteId} left join tb_line l on ls.line_id = l.id ,tb_line_site ls2 left join tb_city_site cs2 on cs2.id = #{endSiteId} ,tb_param p where ls.site_id = #{startSiteId} and ls2.site_id = #{endSiteId} and p.type_english = 'lineDirection' and ls.property_id = 1 and ls2.property_id = 1 and ls2.start_index > ls.start_index and p.value = 1

select distinct l.name lineName,ls.line_id lineId,cs.name startSiteName,cs2.name endSiteName ,cs.x_position startSiteLongitude,cs.y_position startSiteLatitude,ls.back_index startIndex ,cs2.x_position endSiteLongitude,cs2.y_position endSiteLatitude,ls2.back_index endIndex ,p.name propertyName,p.value propertyId from tb_line_site ls left join tb_city_site cs on cs.id = #{startSiteId} left join tb_line l on ls.line_id = l.id ,tb_line_site ls2 left join tb_city_site cs2 on cs2.id = #{endSiteId} ,tb_param p where ls.site_id = #{startSiteId} and ls2.site_id = #{endSiteId} and p.type_english = 'lineDirection' and ls.property_id = 2 and ls2.property_id = 2 and ls2.back_index > ls.back_index and p.value = 2
